articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar Matthew Hayden had contradictory views about pitches in India after the fourth Test in Ahmedabad ended in a tame draw with India winning the Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2-1. | Cricket
articles.content: The legendary Sunil Gavaskar and Australia great Matthew Hayden did not see eye-to-eye after the India vs Australia 4th Test in Ahmedabad ended in a draw. Although India won the Border-Gavaskar Troph… [+3444 chars]
